title: CafePress Aged, Plumas T Shirt 100% Cotton T-Shirt, White
features: These quality short-sleeve crew-neck t-shirts are 100% pre-shrunk cotton and are soft and durable for a comfortable feel. Fit is unisex standard (size up if in doubt).
Our graphic tee designs are professionally printed, so your unique design will look great and make someone smile with the funny, cute, vintage, or expressive artwork.
Treat yourself, or make this t shirt the perfect gift for Mother's Day, Father's Day, Valentine's Day, Christmas, birthdays, anniversaries, retirement, or for no reason at all!
Machine wash cold inside out with like colors and tumble dry low for easy and convenient care. IMPORTED.
We offer a 100% money back guarantee, so you can buy with confidence. Your satisfaction is our promise, and returns/exchanges are made easy.
description: This standard fit short-sleeve t-shirt features a comfortable crew neck and quality construction, making it the perfect graphic tee gift for both men and women. The soft fabric looks as good as it feels, and this tee is durable for everyday wear. Our cute, funny, and unique designs are printed professionally, and make great novelty gifts for him or her, young or old. And with CafePress, your satisfaction is always our promise...buy with confidence, as we offer easy returns and exchanges and a 100% money back guarantee.
